questions.question: How many years of relevant experience does the consultant have?
What compliance standards has the consultant worked with?
What industries has the consultant primarily worked in?
What is the consultant's highest achieved qualification?
What key skills does the consultant possess?
What kind of leadership experience does the consultant have?
What project management methodologies is the consultant familiar with?
What specific technical tools and software is the consultant proficient in?
What types of financial analysis has the consultant conducted?

candidates.cv:
Over 20 years in-depth experience in designing and developing End-to-End monitoring solutions. With a full comprehensive knowledge and experience of supporting and monitoring high availability e-commerce systems, online payment systems and banking applications.  

Product lead & SME for the design and implementation of Dynatrace for Lloyds Banking Group to monitor the critical payment and business applications.

Created and established the Operations Support team for Harrods.com.

Introduced both the ITIL and the DevOps framework to Harrods E-commerce Operations Team. 

Successfully implemented Akamai CDN to Harrods.com to achieve greater international presence.

Implemented monitoring tools Gomez and Dynatrace AppMon for Harrods.com 

Key stakeholder and vendor management skills from both development projects and operations.

Responsible for PCI-DSS and DPA compliance.

Lead Designer for John Lewis, designing their new call centre website. Designed to enable call centre agents to quickly take customer orders over the phone, reduce the time for training and improve the rate of cross sales and up sales

Implemented Card Authentication for John Lewis. This high level project required complex business planning to ensure that the customer checkout experience was not compromised.
candidates.cv_summary: Darren Miller is a seasoned consultant with over 20 years of experience in the banking and e-commerce sectors. He specializes in designing and developing end-to-end monitoring solutions, with significant expertise in high availability systems. As a product lead at Lloyds Banking Group, he implemented Dynatrace for critical applications. He also established the Operations Support team at Harrods.com, integrating ITIL and DevOps frameworks. Notable projects include the design of John Lewis's call center website and the implementation of PCI-DSS compliance. His skills encompass ITIL certification, e-commerce, and compliance management.

Phil Dodd is an experienced consultant in the financial services sector, currently based in London. He has extensive expertise in financial audits, financial analysis, and commercial finance, demonstrated through various roles in prominent companies. He served as a Finance Business Partner at Cognizant from 2022 to 2024 and previously held positions as a Commercial Finance Manager and Financial Analyst. His career began at Lloyds Banking Group, where he worked as a contractor until 2016. Phil is skilled in delivering presentations and has a strong foundation in financial operations.

Brad Bachu is a consultant with a background in financial services, currently based in New York. He transitioned from a physicist to the crypto industry, demonstrating a strong analytical skill set. Proficient in Mathematica/Wolfram Language, SQL, Python, and C++, he has held various research and strategy positions at Uniswap Labs, including a current role as a Research Scientist since June 2023. His earlier experiences include work as a Strategy Intern at Uniswap, a Visiting Graduate Researcher in Germany, and an Undergraduate Research Assistant at MIT, showcasing a solid foundation in research and analysis.

Hugo Given is an Investment Banking Analyst with experience in restructuring at Houlihan Lokey and previously at PJT Partners as an Analyst and Summer Analyst. He has developed strong analytical skills with a foundation in finance and mathematics, complemented by programming proficiency in Python. His career began as an Equity Analyst Intern at Susquehanna International Group in Dublin. Hugo is based in London and is actively engaged in the investment banking sector, with a focus on financial analysis and restructuring.

candidates.cv:
I am a Financial Controller with significant business partnering, management accounting, operations management and executive reporting experience within media, financial services, retail and FMCG in the UK and Australia.  I am an effective communicator with strong relationship building skills and keen to drive operational efficiencies within businesses.

I have a Mathematics degree and am a qualified accountant (FCCA) . I started off my working career in the UK and moved to Australia in Jan 2006 and returned to UK in June 2015.
candidates.cv_summary: Frederick Richards is a Financial Controller with extensive experience in business partnering and management accounting across media, financial services, retail, and FMCG sectors in the UK and Australia. He possesses strong skills in executive reporting, financial analysis, financial modeling, and business process improvement. Frederick holds a Mathematics degree and is a qualified FCCA accountant. His career includes roles at WPP and Havas Health & You, where he has focused on driving operational efficiencies and building strong relationships within organizations. He is currently based in Greater London.
